titles.en_GB: How much do you want to invest?

titles.de_DE: Very low: I want to invest my money as securely as possible. My Chances of gains are therefore lower, as are my risks of losses.
titles.en_GB: Very low: I want to invest my money as securely as possible. My Chances of gains are therefore lower, as are my risks of losses.
titles.fr_FR: Très faible: Je veux investir mon argent de la manière la plus sécurisée possible. Mes chances de gains et de pertes seront donc moins importantes.

titles.de_DE: Low: I am prepared to take a few risks in order to increase my chances of gains.
titles.en_GB: Low: I am prepared to take a few risks in order to increase my chances of gains.
titles.fr_FR: Faible: Je suis prêt à prendre quelques risques pour augmenter mes chances de gains.

titles.de_DE: Moderate: I believe my chances for gains are higher than the likelihood of losing a proportion of my money. For this reason I can also accept a moderate level of risk.
titles.en_GB: Moderate: I believe my chances for gains are higher than the likelihood of losing a proportion of my money. For this reason I can also accept a moderate level of risk.
titles.fr_FR: Moyenne: J'estime mes chances de gains supérieures à mes possibilités de pertes. Pour cette raison, je suis prêt à accepter un niveau de risque modéré.

titles.de_DE: High: I want to significantly increase my chances of gains and so knowingly take the risk and accept the risk that I might lose money in long term.
titles.en_GB: High: I want to significantly increase my chances of gains and so knowingly take the risk and accept the risk that I might lose money in long term.
titles.fr_FR: Forte: Je veux significativement augmenter mes chances de gains et donc prendre et accepter le risque que je puisse perdre de l'argent sur le long terme.

titles.de_DE: Very high: I want to increase my chances of gains as much as possible
titles.en_GB: Very high: I want to increase my chances of gains as much as possible
titles.fr_FR: Très forte: Je veux augmenter mes chances de gains autant que possible
Quelle est votre appetence au risque ?

titles.de_DE: Yes, I want to include social and responsible investment
titles.en_GB: Yes, I want to include social and responsible investment
titles.fr_FR: Oui, je veux inclure des fonds responsables

titles.de_DE: Yes, I want to include small caps funds
titles.en_GB: Yes, I want to include small caps funds
titles.fr_FR: Oui, je souhaite intégrer des fonds finançant les petites et moyennes entreprises

titles.de_DE: Yes I want only ETF in my portfolio
titles.en_GB: Yes I want only ETF in my portfolio
titles.fr_FR: Oui, je ne souhaite que des ETF dans mon portefeuille

titles.de_DE: Do you want to include specific funds in your portfolio?
titles.en_GB: Do you want to include specific funds in your portfolio?
titles.fr_FR: Souhaitez-vous inclure certains types de fonds dans votre portefeuille ?
